MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in Aber Ddu and surrounding areas It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11AM to make emergency repairs to overhead lines. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:17AM on 5th April 2021
